German.Text: Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika:Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika:Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1775 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of the American Dream: Additional happiness from running [LINK=CIVIC_REPUBLIC]Republic[\LINK], [LINK=CIVIC_CAPITALISM]Capitalism[\LINK] and [LINK=CIVIC_FREE_MARKET]Free Market[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Manifest Destiny: Allows no [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPEAN_REDIRECT]European[\LINK] colonies in the North and Central America and in the Caribbean and control or vassalize [LINK=CIVILIZATION_MEXICO]Mexico[\LINK] in 1900 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The American Dream: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_STATUE_OF_LIBERTY]Statue of Liberty[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_EMPIRE_STATE]Empire State Building[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_PENTAGON]Pentagon[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_UNITED_NATIONS]United Nations[\LINK] by 1950 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The World's Policeman: Secure 10 [LINK=BONUS_OIL]Oil[\LINK] resources by 2000 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 60 minutes, 600 AD: 30 minutes, 1700 AD: 10 minutes

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 620 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Faith: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ijtihad: Be the most advanced civilization in 1300 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Jihad: Control Egypt, the Maghreb, Spain, Mesopotamia and Persia directly or by vassal in 1300 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Dawah: Spread [LINK=RELIGION_ISLAM]Islam[\LINK] to 40% of the cities in the world[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 20 minutes, 600 AD: 2 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.English: United Provinces of the River Plate
Viceroyalty of the Rio de la Plata

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1810 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Juntas: [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_GENERAL]Great Generals[\LINK] can start Golden Ages[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Argentine Paradox: Experience two golden ages by 1930 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tango and Poetry: Have 25000 culture in Buenos Aires by 1960 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peronism: Experience five golden ages by 2000 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 75 minutes, 600 AD: 45 minutes, 1700 AD: 20 minutes

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1200 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Flower Wars: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chinampa: Make Tenochtitlan the largest city in the world in 1520 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Human Sacrifice: Build 6 [LINK=BUILDING_OBELISK]Pagan Temples[\LINK] and [LINK=BUILDING_AZTEC_SACRIFICIAL_ALTAR]Sacrificial Altars[\LINK] by 1650 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]European Flower Wars: Enslave 20 Old World units[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 3000 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of the Cradle of Civilization: Begins the game with the knowledge of [LINK=TECH_ANIMAL_HUSBANDRY]Animal Husbandry[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_POTTERY]Pottery[\LINK] and [LINK=TECH_ARCHERY]Archery[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hammurabi's Code: Be the first to discover [LINK=TECH_WRITING]Writing[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_CODE_OF_LAWS]Code of Laws[\LINK] and [LINK=TECH_MONARCHY]Monarchy[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Fertile Crescent: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Tower of Babel: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: Playable from Start, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1822 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Ethanol: [LINK=BONUS_SUGAR]Sugar[\LINK] counts as [LINK=BONUS_OIL]oil[\LINK] for the [LINK=CORPORATION_7]Oil Industry[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Golden Law: Control 10 [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_SLAVE_PLANTATION]Slave Plantations[\LINK] and 4 [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_PASTURE]Pastures[\LINK] in 1880 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Maracana, Cristo Redentor, Itaipu: Build [LINK=BUILDING_BROADWAY]Wembley[\LINK], [LINK=BUILDING_CRISTO_REDENTOR]Cristo Redentor[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_THREE_GORGES_DAM]Three Gorges Dam[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pindorama: Control 20 [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FOREST_PRESERVE]Forest Preserves[\LINK] and have a [LINK=BUILDING_NATIONAL_PARK]National Park[\LINK] in your capital by 1950 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 75 minutes, 600 AD: 45 minutes, 1700 AD: 20 minutes

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 330 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Bribery: Double gold value in trades, [LINK=UNIT_SPY]Spies[\LINK] can bribe barbarian units[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Crossroads of the World: Have 5000 gold in 1000 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]City of the World's Desire: Make Constantinople the world's largest and most cultured city in 1200 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Eternal Empire: Control three cities in the Balkans, Northern Africa and the Near East in 1450 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 15 minutes, 600 AD: Playable from Start, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1867 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Multiculturalism: Immigrants bring [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] to your cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Mari Usque Ad Mare: Connect your capital to an Atlantic and a Pacific port by railroad by 1920 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Great White North: Control all cities and 90% of the territory in Canada without ever conquering a city by 1950 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peacekeeping: End twelve wars through diplomacy by 2000 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 80 minutes, 600 AD: 50 minutes, 1700 AD: 25 minutes

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1200 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Mercenaries: Halved costs and no extra upkeep for [LINK=PROMOTION_MERCENARY]Hurried Units[\LINK], [LINK=CIVIC_MERCENARIES]Mercenaries[\LINK] is enabled at start[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]New Tyre: Build a [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE]Palace[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_COTHON]Great Cothon[\LINK] in Carthage by 300 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Punic Wars: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Traders in Purple: Have 5000 gold in 200 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 5 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 760 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] No Unique Power[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No Historical Victory Goals[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: Non-Playable Civilization, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 3000 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Invention: Faster research of techologies that nobody has discovered yet until the Renaissance[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mandate of Heaven: Build 2 [LINK=BUILDING_CONFUCIAN_CATHEDRAL]Confucian Kong Miaos[\LINK] and 2 [LINK=BUILDING_TAOIST_CATHEDRAL]Taoist Gongs[\LINK] by 1000 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Four Great Inventions: Be first to discover [LINK=TECH_COMPASS]Compass[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_PAPER]Paper[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_GUNPOWDER]Gunpowder[\LINK] and [LINK=TECH_PRINTING_PRESS]Printing Press[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ten Thousand Years: Experience four golden ages by 1800 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: Playable from Start, 600 AD: Playable from Start, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1814 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Liberation: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Bolivar Doctrine: Allow no [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPEAN_REDIRECT]European[\LINK] colonies in Peru, Gran Colombia, the Guayanas and the Caribbean in 1870 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]United States of South America: Control South America in 1920 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Auge del Café: Acquire 5000 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 75 minutes, 600 AD: 45 minutes, 1700 AD: 20 minutes (Can only be played by loading as Argentina then swapping to Colombia when a pop-up asks if you would like to play as Colombia)

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 3000 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of the Pharaoh: [LINK=CIVIC_DYNASTICISM]Dynasticism[\LINK], [LINK=CIVIC_SLAVERY]Slavery[\LINK] and [LINK=CIVIC_PANTHEON]Pantheon[\LINK] are enabled at start[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Valley of Kings: Have more than 500 Culture in 850 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Monuments on the Nile: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_PYRAMID]Great Pyramids[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_LIBRARY]Great Library[\LINK], and the [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_LIGHTHOUSE]Great Lighthouse[\LINK] by 100 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Ptolemaic Dynasty: Have more than 5000 Culture in 170 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: Playable from Start, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 820 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Indirect Rule: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Sun Never Sets: Colonize every continent by 1730 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Britannia Rule the Waves: Control a total of 25 [LINK=UNIT_FRIGATE]Frigates[\LINK] or [LINK=UNIT_SHIP_OF_THE_LINE]Ships of the Line[\LINK] and sink 50 ships by 1800 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Industrial Revolution: Be the first to enter Industrial and Modern eras[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 30 minutes, 600 AD: 10 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1600 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Philosophy: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The School of Hellas: Be the first to discover [LINK=TECH_LITERATURE]Literature[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_DRAMA]Drama[\LINK] and [LINK=TECH_PHILOSOPHY]Philosophy[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Wonders of the Aegean: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_ORACLE]Shrine of Apollo[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_PARTHENON]Parthenon[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_COLOSSUS]Colossus[\LINK], and the [LINK=BUILDING_ARTEMIS]Temple of Artemis[\LINK] by 250 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alexander's Empire: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 330 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 2 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 3000 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Sanitation: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade Networks: Establish a trade connection with another civilization by 1600 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Architecture: Build three [LINK=BUILDING_HARAPPAN_BATH]Baths[\LINK] and two [LINK=BUILDING_WALLS]Walls[\LINK] by 1500 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Urban Planning: Have a total population of 20 by 800 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: Playable from Start, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1150 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Terraces: [LINK=TERRAIN_PEAK]Peak[\LINK] tiles produce 2 food and 1 hammer, No penalties for cultural expansion over [LINK=TERRAIN_PEAK]Peak[\LINK] tiles[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Andean Road System: Build five [LINK=BUILDING_INCAN_TAMBO]Tambos[\LINK] and a road along the Andean Coast by 1500 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sierra de la Plata: Have 2500 gold in 1550 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Eight Incan Regions: Control 60% of South America in 1700 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1500 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Purity: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Dharmic Religions: Control the [LINK=BUILDING_HINDU_SHRINE]Kashi Vishwanath[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_BUDDHIST_SHRINE]Mahabodhi[\LINK] in 100 BC[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land of Temples: Build 20 [LINK=CONCEPT_TEMPLES_REDIRECT]Temples[\LINK] by 700 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sacred Rivers: Control 20% of the world's population in 1200 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 2 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 700 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Straits: Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Prosperous Excellence: Have the largest population in the world in 1300 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Emerald of the Equator: Acquire 10 different [LINK=CONCEPT_HAPPY_BONUSES_REDIRECT]Happiness Resources[\LINK] by 1500 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]National Awakening: Control 9% of the world's population in 1940 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 15 minutes, 600 AD: 2 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1500 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Safaviyya: Religious buildings produce +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and +2 [ICON_RESEARCH][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]European Embassies: Have open borders with 6 [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPEAN_REDIRECT]European[\LINK] civilizations in 1650 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nader Shah: Control Mesopotamia, Transoxania and Northwestern India in 1750 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Half of the World: Have a city of at least 20000 culture in 1800 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start (Can only be played by loading as the Congolese then swapping to Iran when a pop-up asks if you would like to play as Iran, Except in the 1700 AD scenario when it is selectable from the choose your civilization screen)

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1167 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of the Renaissance: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Renaissance Architecture: Build [LINK=BUILDING_SAN_MARCO]San Marco Basilica[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_SISTINE_CHAPEL]Sistine Chapel[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_LEANING_TOWER]Leaning Tower[\LINK] by 1500 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Renaissance Art: Have three cities with influential culture by 1600 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mare Nostrum: Control 65% of the Mediterranean by 1930 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 525 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Modernization: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tranquility and Peace: Have an average city culture of 6000 by 1600 AD without ever losing a city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All the World Under One Roof: Control or vassalize [LINK=CIVILIZATION_KOREA]Korea[\LINK], Manchuria, [LINK=CIVILIZATION_CHINA]China[\LINK], Indochina, [LINK=CIVILIZATION_INDONESIA]Indonesia[\LINK] and the Philippines in 1940 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Flying Geese Paradigm: Be the first to discover five modern technologies[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 20 minutes, 600 AD: Playable from Start, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

German.Text: Provinz Aurea Chersonesus:Provinz Aurea Chersonesus:Provinz Aurea Chersonesus

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 660 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Monsoons: All land units can move through [LINK=FEATURE_JUNGLE]Jungles[\LINK] and [LINK=FEATURE_RAINFOREST]Rainforests[\LINK], can build [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]Farms[\LINK] on [LINK=FEATURE_RAINFOREST]Rainforest[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Angkor Wat: Build four [LINK=BUILDING_BUDDHIST_MONASTERY]Buddhist Monasteries[\LINK], four [LINK=BUILDING_HINDU_MONASTERY]Hindu Monasteries[\LINK], and the [LINK=BUILDING_ANGKOR_WAT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[\LINK] by 1200 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Thom Baray: Have an average city size of 12 or more by 1450 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Preah Srei: Have 8000 culture by 1450 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 20 minutes, 600 AD: 2 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1390 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of the Tropics: [LINK=FEATURE_JUNGLE]Jungles[\LINK], [LINK=FEATURE_RAINFOREST]Rainforests[\LINK] and [LINK=FEATURE_MUD]Marshes[\LINK] yield +1 food, +1 production and cause no unhealthiness[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Catholic Congo: Acquire 15% of the votes in the [LINK=BUILDING_APOSTOLIC_PALACE]Apostolic Palace[\LINK] by 1650 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Middle Passage: Gain 1000 gold through [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]Slave[\LINK] trade by 1800 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Industrial Africa: Enter the Industrial Era before anyone enters the Modern Era[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 50 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Kobuksons: Free [LINK=PROMOTION_DRILL1]Drill I[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_DRILL2]Drill II[\LINK] promotions for all [LINK=UNITCOMBAT_NAVAL]Naval Units[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Palman Daejanggyeong and Gukjagam: Build a [LINK=BUILDING_BUDDHIST_CATHEDRAL]Buddhist Stupa[\LINK] and a [LINK=BUILDING_CONFUCIAN_CATHEDRAL]Confucian Kong Miao[\LINK] by 1200 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Choe Yun-ui: Be first to discover [LINK=TECH_PRINTING_PRESS]Printing Press[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Yi Sun-sin: Sink 20 enemy ships[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 15 minutes, 600 AD: Playable from Start, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

German.Text: Islamische Republik Mali:Islamische Republik Mali:Islamischen Republik Mali

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 980 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Wealth: +1 commerce in every land plot[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Great Hajj: Conduct a [LINK=UNIT_MERCHANT]Trade Mission[\LINK] to your holy city by 1350 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Madrassa of Timbuktu: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_SANKORE]University of Sankore[\LINK] and settle a [LINK=UNIT_PROPHET]Great Prophet[\LINK] in its city by 1500 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Caravans of the Sahara: Have 5000 gold in 1500 AD and 15000 gold in 1700 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

German.Text: Bundesrepublik der Maya:Bundesrepublik der Maya:Bundesrepublik der Maya

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 65 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Astronomy: -40% research cost until beginning of the Middle Ages[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Sun: Discover [LINK=TECH_CALENDAR]Calendar[\LINK] by 600 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Gods: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_CHICHEN_ITZA]Temple of Kukulkan[\LINK] by 900 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Stars: Make contact with a [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPEAN_REDIRECT]European[\LINK] civilization before they discover America[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 15 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1810 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Arid Agriculture: Can build [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]Farms[\LINK] on [LINK=FEATURE_HILLS]Hills[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Church and State: Build three [LINK=CONCEPT_CATHEDRALS_REDIRECT]Cathedrals[\LINK] of your state religion by 1880 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Revolutionary Leaders: Create three [LINK=UNIT_GREAT_GENERAL]Great Generals[\LINK] by 1940 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The City of Palaces: Make Mexico City the largest city in the world in 1960 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 75 minutes, 600 AD: 45 minutes, 1700 AD: 20 minutes (Can only be played by loading as Argentina then swapping to Mexico when a pop-up asks if you would like to play as Mexico)

Italian.Text: La Nazione minore:la Nazione minore:della Nazione minore:della Nazione minore

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1190 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Terror: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Yuan Dynasty: Control China by 1300 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Scourge of God: Raze at least 7 cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pax Mongolica: Control 12% of the world's territory by 1500 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 711 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Irrigation: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Plains[\LINK] tiles until the Renaissance[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Caliphate of Al-Andalus: Control three cities in Iberia, the Maghreb and West Africa in 1200 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Jewel of the World: Settle a total of five Great [LINK=UNIT_PROPHET]Prophets[\LINK], [LINK=UNIT_SCIENTIST]Scientists[\LINK] or [LINK=UNIT_ENGINEER]Engineers[\LINK] in Cordoba by 1300 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbary Corsairs: Acquire 3000 gold through [LINK=UNIT_MOORISH_CORSAIR]Piracy[\LINK] by 1650 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 15 minutes, 600 AD: 2 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1206 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Tolerance: No unhappiness from non-state religions[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Muhammad ibn Tughluq: Build three [LINK=BUILDING_ISLAMIC_CATHEDRAL]Islamic Mosques[\LINK] by 1500 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shah Akbar: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_RED_FORT]Red Fort[\LINK], [LINK=BUILDING_HARMANDIR_SAHIB]Harmandir Sahib[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_TAJ_MAHAL]Taj Mahal[\LINK] by 1660 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shah Jahan: Have more than 50000 culture in 1750 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1280 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Devshirme: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Golden Apple: Have four non-obsolete wonders (excluding [LINK=CONCEPT_SHRINES_REDIRECT]shrines[\LINK]) in your capital in 1550 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Empire on three Continents: Control the Eastern Mediterranean, the Black Sea, Cairo, Mecca, Baghdad and Vienna by 1700 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Tulip Period: Have more culture than all [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPEAN_REDIRECT]European[\LINK] civilizations combined in 1800 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 850 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Satrapy: No stability penalties for controlling cities with foreign culture[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The First Empire: Control 7% of the world's territory by 140 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Seven Wonders of the World: Control 7 world wonders (excluding [LINK=CONCEPT_SHRINES_REDIRECT]Shrines[\LINK]) by 350 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land of Religions: Control 2 [LINK=CONCEPT_SHRINES_REDIRECT]Shrines[\LINK] in 350 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 5 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1025 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Golden Liberty: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Folwark System: Have three cities of at least size 12 by 1400 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Golden Liberty: Be first to discover [LINK=TECH_LIBERALISM]Liberalism[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Commonwealth: Build three [LINK=CONCEPT_CHRISTIAN_CATHEDRALS_REDIRECT]Christian Cathedrals[\LINK] by 1600 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1000 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Navigation: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Oceanic Navigators: Settle two of the following island groups by 800 AD: Hawaii, New Zealand, Marqusas and Easter Island[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Polynesian Triangle: Settle Hawaii, New Zealand, Marquesas and Easter Island by 1000 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rano Raraku: Build the [LINK=BUILDING_MOAI_STATUES]Moai Statues[\LINK] by 1200 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 5 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available (If the Human is not Polynesia it will not spawn)

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1130 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Exploration: Ocean Trade allowed with [LINK=TECH_OPTICS]Optics[\LINK], reduced instability for overseas colonies, the [LINK=BUILDING_TRADING_COMPANY]Trading Company[\LINK] National Wonder is allowed with [LINK=TECH_ASTRONOMY]Astronomy[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cartaz: Have open borders agreement with 14 other civs by 1550 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Age of Discovery: Acquire 12 [LINK=CORPORATION_2]Trading Company[\LINK] resources by 1650 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Treaty of Tordesilhas: Control 15 colonies in Brazil, Africa and Asia in 1700 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 760 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Infrastructure: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bread and Circuses: Build 6 [LINK=BUILDING_BARRACKS]Barracks[\LINK], 5 [LINK=BUILDING_AQUEDUCT]Aqueducts[\LINK], 4 [LINK=BUILDING_COLOSSEUM]Ampitheatres[\LINK] and 3 [LINK=BUILDING_ROMAN_FORUM]Forums[\LINK] by 100 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Pax Romana: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Classical Scholarship: Be the first to discover [LINK=TECH_THEOLOGY]Theology[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_MACHINERY]Machinery[\LINK] and [LINK=TECH_CIVIL_SERVICE]Civil Service[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 5 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 860 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of General Winter: Enemy units in Russia take damage every turn[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Eastward Expansion: Found 7 colonies in Siberia by 1700 AD and build the Trans-Siberian Railway by 1920 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Cold War: Be the first civilization to complete the [LINK=PROJECT_MANHATTAN_PROJECT]Manhattan Project[\LINK] and the [LINK=PROJECT_APOLLO_PROGRAM]Apollo Program[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Iron Curtain: Have friendly relations with 5 [LINK=CIVIC_CENTRAL_PLANNING]Communist[\LINK] civilizations by 1950 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 30 minutes, 600 AD: 10 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start
The Civilization and Leader will be chosen randomly.
TEXT.French: La civilisation et le dirigeant seront choisis aléatoirement.
TEXT.German: Zivilisation und Staatsoberhaupt werden zufällig ausgewählt.
TEXT.Italian: Leader e civiltà verranno scelti casualmente.
TEXT.Spanish: La civilización y el líder se elegirán al azar.

TEXT.English: The Leader will be chosen randomly.
TEXT.Spanish: El líder se elegirá al azar.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1040 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Intolerance: Non-State Religions are removed and your State Religion spread to conquered cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No Historical Victory Goals[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: Non-Playable Civilization, 600 AD: Non-Playable Civilization, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 722 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Discovery: Free [LINK=PROMOTION_NAVIGATION1]Navigation I[\LINK] and [LINK=PROMOTION_NAVIGATION2]Navigation II[\LINK] promotions for all naval units, the [LINK=BUILDING_TRADING_COMPANY]Trading Company[\LINK] National Wonder is allowed with [LINK=TECH_ASTRONOMY]Astronomy[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Plus Ultra: Be the first to found a colony in America[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Treasure Fleet: Secure a total of 10 [LINK=BONUS_SILVER]Silver[\LINK] and [LINK=BONUS_GOLD]Gold[\LINK] resources by 1650 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Soldiers of God: Spread [LINK=RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY]Catholicism[\LINK] to 40% of the world's population and allows no [LINK=RELIGION_JUDAISM]Protestant[\LINK] civilizations in Europe in 1700 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 25 minutes, 600 AD: 5 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 300 BC[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Thalassocracy: Extra commerce on [LINK=TERRAIN_COAST]Coast[\LINK] and [LINK=TERRAIN_OCEAN]Ocean[\LINK] tiles[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Sangam Period: Have 3000 gold and 2000 culture in 800 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Chola Empire: Control or vassalize the Deccan and Srivijaya in 100 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Indian Ocean Trade: Acquire 4000 gold by trade (Trade Routes, Diplomacy, [LINK=UNIT_MERCHANT]Trade Missions[\LINK]) by 1200 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 10 minutes, 600 AD: Not Available, 1700 AD: Not Available

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 1350 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Father Governs Children: Can use twice as many units to generate [LINK=CONCEPT_MILITARY_HAPPINESS_REDIRECT]Military Happiness[\LINK][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The King and I: Have open borders with 10 civilizations by 1650 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Venice of the East: Make Ayutthaya the most populous city in the world in 1700 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Circle of Power: Allows no foreign powers in Southern Asia in 1900 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 35 minutes, 600 AD: 15 minutes, 1700 AD: Playable from Start

[BOLD]Starting year:[\BOLD] 630 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Unique Power:[\BOLD] The Power of Missionaries: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Historical Victory goals:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Tibetan Empire: Acquire 5 cities by 1000 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tibetan Buddhism: Spread [LINK=RELIGION_BUDDHISM]Buddhism[\LINK] to 30% by 1400 AD[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Dalai Lamas: Settle 5 [LINK=UNIT_PROPHET]Great Prophets[\LINK] in Lhasa by 1700 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Estimated Loading Time:[\BOLD] 3000 BC: 20 minutes, 600 AD: 2 minutes, 1700 AD: Not Available

TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% EXP pour la promotion des unités

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% Great General Emergence inside Cultural Borders
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Emergence d'un grand Général à l'intérieur des frontières culturelles %D1%%
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% Produktion Großer Generäle innerhalb der kulturellen Grenzen
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% comparsa di un Grande Generale all'interno dei confini culturali
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% de aparición de un Gran general dentro de las fronteras culturales
[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% a la producción de maravillas nacionales
[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% a la producción de maravillas de equipo
[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1%% a la producción de maravillas del mundo

TEXT.English: The Power of the American Dream:
Additional happiness from running Republic, Capitalism and Free Market
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Zufriedenheit unter Republik, Kapitalismus und Freiem Markt

TEXT.English: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
TEXT.German: Ausbreitung der Staatsreligion inklusive Tempeln in eroberten Städten

TEXT.English: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.German: Große Generäle können Goldene Zeitalter auslösen

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
TEXT.German: Versklavung besiegter feindlicher Einheiten durch Militäreinheiten, can Sklaven opfern, um Zufriedenheit in Städten zu erhöhen

TEXT.English: The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:
TEXT.German: Die Macht der Wiege der Zivilisation:

TEXT.English: Begins the game with the knowledge of Animal Husbandry, Pottery and Archery
TEXT.German: Beginnt das Spiel mit dem Wissen über Tierzucht, Keramik und Bogenschießen

TEXT.English: Sugar counts as oil for the Oil Industry
TEXT.German: Zucker zählt als Öl für die Ölindustrie

TEXT.English: Double gold value in trades, Spies can bribe barbarian units
TEXT.German: Doppelter Wert von Gold beim Handeln, Spione können barbarische Einheiten bestechen

TEXT.English: Halved costs and no extra upkeep for Hurried Units, Mercenaries is enabled at start
TEXT.German: Halbierte Kosten und kein zusätzlicher Unterhalt für beschleunigte Einheiten

TEXT.English: Faster research of techologies that nobody has discovered yet until the Renaissance
TEXT.German: Schnellere Forschung von Technologien, die bisher niemand entdeckt hat, bis zum Beginn der Renaissance

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.German: Keinen Widerstand in eroberten Städten in Lateinamerika

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.German: %s1 hat eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!

TEXT.English: Dynasticism, Slavery and Pantheon are enabled at start
TEXT.German: Aktivierung von Dynastizismus, Sklaverei und Pantheon beim Spielstart

TEXT.English: A part of our population from %s1 is emigrating to the New World!
TEXT.German: Ein Teil unserer Bevölkerung aus %s1 wandert in die Neue Welt aus!

TEXT.English: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance
TEXT.German: Weit entfernte Städte kosten keinen zusätzlichen Unterhalt

TEXT.Italian: La tua unità è stata schiavizzata!

TEXT.English: An enemy unit has been enslaved!
TEXT.French: Une unité ennemie a été asservie !

TEXT.English: Land units receive +10% additional strength within cultural borders
TEXT.German: Landeinheiten erhalten +10% zusätzliche Stärke innerhalb kultureller Grenzen

TEXT.English: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
TEXT.German: Diplomatische Mali verfallen schneller; höhere Wahrscheinlichkeit, Stimmen in Kongressen zu erhalten

TEXT.English: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era
TEXT.German: +150% Geburtenrate von Großen Persönlichkeiten bis zum Ende des klassischen Zeitalters

TEXT.English: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.German: Die Griechen haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!

TEXT.English: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
Doubled yield and commerce from the Trading Company corporation
Double construction speed of state religion buildings
TEXT.German: Doppelte Baugeschwindigkeit für Gebäude der Staatsreligion

TEXT.English: Our population in %s1 is growing due to immigrants from the Old World!
TEXT.French: Notre population augmente grâce aux immigrants du Vieux Monde !
TEXT.German: Unsere Bevölkerung in %s1 wächst durch Einwanderer aus der Alten Welt!
TEXT.Italian: La nostra popolazione sta crescendo grazie agli immigranti dal vecchio mondo!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Nuestra población está creciendo como consecuencia de la inmigración procedente del Viejo Mundo!

TEXT.English: Mountains produce 2 food and 1 hammer, No penalties for cultural expansion over Peak tiles
One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]
Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core
TEXT.German: Zusätzliches Gold von ausländischen Schiffen, die unser Kerngebiet passieren

TEXT.English: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
TEXT.German: Zusätzlicher Spezialist in allen Städten bis zum Industriezeitalter

TEXT.English: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.German: Nachdem alle Technologien des Mittelalters entdeckt wurden, kostet jede Technologie -50% [ICON_RESEARCH], die drei andere Zivilisationen zu tauschen bereit sind

TEXT.English: All land units can move through Jungles and Rainforests, can build Farms on Rainforest
TEXT.German: Landeinheiten können Dschungel und Regenwald durchqueren, kann Farmen in Regenwald errichten

TEXT.English: Jungles, Rainforests and Marshes yield +1 food, +1 production and cause no unhealthiness
TEXT.German: Dschungel, Regenwälder und Marschen geben zusätzliche Nahrung und Produktion und verursachen keine Krankheit

TEXT.English: Free Drill I and Drill II promotions for all Naval Units
TEXT.German: Alle Marineeinheiten erhalten die Drill I und Drill II Beförderung

TEXT.French: +1 commerce sur toutes les cases de terre
TEXT.Italian: +1 commercio in ogni casella di terra
TEXT.Spanish: +1 intercambio en cada casilla de tierra

TEXT.English: -40% research cost until beginning of the Middle Ages
TEXT.German: -40% Forschungskosten bis zum Anfang des Mittelalters

TEXT.English: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest
TEXT.German: Von Ihren Streitkräften bedrohte Städte verfallen in Unruhe

TEXT.English: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!
TEXT.German: Eure erfolgreichen Eroberungen haben Eure Horde wachsen lassen!

TEXT.English: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!
TEXT.German: Die Bürger von %s1 erzittern vor Furcht vor unseren anrückenden Truppen!

TEXT.English: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
TEXT.German: Aus Furcht vor den anrückenden mongolischen Armeen haben die Bürger von %s1 ihre Stellungen aufgegeben!

TEXT.English: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on Plains tiles until the Renaissance
TEXT.German: Verbesserungen, die Nahrung produzieren, geben eine zusätzliche Nahrungseinheit auf Ebenenfeldern bis zur Renaissance

TEXT.English: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
No stability penalties for controlling cities with foreign culture
TEXT.German: Keine Stabilitäts-Mali für die Kontrolle von Städten mit fremder Kultur

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Nahrung und Kommerz durch Goldene Zeitalter

TEXT.English: Ocean Trade allowed with Optics, reduced instability for overseas colonies, the Trading Company National Wonder is allowed with Astronomy
Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed
TEXT.German: Gebäude, die bereits in der Hauptstadt errichtet wurden, erhalten +30% Baugeschwindigkeit

TEXT.English: An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!
TEXT.German: Eine Armee wurde zusammengestellt zum Angriff auf %s1_civ_adjective!

TEXT.English: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.German: Die Römer haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!

TEXT.English: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
TEXT.German: Eure triumphalen Siege haben Euch ermöglicht, eine weitere Legion auszuheben!

TEXT.English: Enemy units in Russia take damage every turn
TEXT.French: Les unités ennemies en Russie subissent des dommages à chaque tour
TEXT.German: Schaden in jeder Runde für feindliche Einheiten in Russland
TEXT.Italian: Le unità nemiche in Russia subiscono danni a ogni turno
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades enemigas en Rusia sufren daños cada turno

TEXT.English: Non-State Religions are removed and your State Religion spread to conquered cities
Free Navigation I and Navigation II promotions for all naval units, the Trading Company National Wonder is allowed with Astronomy
Extra commerce on Coast and Ocean tiles
TEXT.German: Zusätzlicher Kommerz auf Küsten- und Ozeanfeldern

TEXT.English: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.German: Die Tamilen haben eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!

TEXT.English: fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
TEXT.French: craignent de subir le même sort que leurs voisins et se rendent !
TEXT.German: fürchten, dass sie dasselbe Schicksal ereilt wie ihre Nachbarn, und kapitulieren!
TEXT.Italian: temono di subire lo stesso fato dei vicini e si arrendono!
TEXT.Spanish: temen sufrir el mismo destino que sus vecinos y se rinden.

TEXT.English: The Power of Father Governs Children:
TEXT.German: Die Macht von Vater Regiert Kinder:

TEXT.English: Can use twice as many units to generate Military Happiness
TEXT.German: Kann zweimal soviele militärische Einheiten einsetzen, um Zufriedenheit zu generieren

TEXT.English: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
TEXT.German: Kann unbegrenzt Missionare ausbilden; Missionare können fremdes Territorium betreten

TEXT.English: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions
TEXT.German: Kann zwei zusätzliche Einheiten in Städten mit Nicht-Staatsreligionen rekrutieren

TEXT.English: Additional gold from pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
TEXT.German: Zusätzliches gold durch Plünderung, Stadteroberung und das Versenken von Schiffen während des Mittelalters

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]60% of the Number of Cities in your Empire
[ICON_BULLET]16% of the Total Population in your Empire
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]40% of the Number of Cities in your Empire
[ICON_BULLET]8% of the Total Population in your Empire
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]50% of the Number of Cities in your Empire
[ICON_BULLET]12% of the Total Population in your Empire
